import { Button, IconButton } from '@mui/material' import React from 'react' import RemoveCircleOutlineIcon from '@mui/icons-material/RemoveCircleOutline'; import AddCircleOutlineIcon from '@mui/icons-material/AddCircleOutline'; import { useDispatch } from 'react-redux'; import { removeCartItem, updateCartItem } from '../../../state/cart/Action'; const CartItem = ({item}) => { const dispatch = useDispatch(); const handleUpdateCartItem = (num) => { const data = {data:{quantity:item.quantity+num,cartItemId:item?.id}} console.log(data) dispatch(updateCartItem(data)) } const handleRemoveCartItem = () => { dispatch(removeCartItem(item.id)) } return (

{item.product.title}

Size: {item.size} Black

Seller : {item.product.brand}

{item.price}

{item.discountedPrice}

{item.discountedPersent}% Off

handleUpdateCartItem(-1)} disabled={item.quantity<=1}> {item.quantity} handleUpdateCartItem(1)} sx={{color:"RGB(145 85 253)"}}>
) } export default CartItem
